Wines & beverages
KLM
world
business class

A matter of taste:
KLM'S wine cellar in the sky
With wine, the truth is not on the label but
behind it - in the bottle. Only by sampling a
wine, can its quality be judged. This is why
KLM has it's own wine tasting panel - a
dedicated group of experts who select the best
possible wines for you, our passenger,
throughout the year. At the panel sessions,
tastings are always blind. In this way, the
participants are not influenced by name or
reputation but only by the intrinsic qualities of
the wine itself compared with wines from the
same country, region or grape. The samples
often come straight from the producers
themselves, so that KLM's wine cellar in the sky
regularly carries exclusive wines no other airline
can offer.
Looking at our wine list, you will find wines
from famous, classical regions as well as 'KLM's
Special wine' which changes more frequently.
By offering you a choice of our classical
standard wines or our special wine, KLM
affirms the indisputable truth that wine means
variety.
Please judge for yourself - ask the cabin staff to
let you try the various wines and you will
discover your favourite wine and food
combinations, which are - of course - very
much, a matter of taste.
Hubrecht Duyker
Wine writer
